content.rendered:
academic & Community Outreach

We strive to be a good citizen and neighbor and give back through local veteran, humanitarian youth/educational, and economic and business organizations near our offices

excerpt.rendered: academic & Community Outreach We strive to be a good citizen and neighbor and give back through local veteran, humanitarian youth/educational, and economic and business organizations near our offices High Schools Helping Robotics, Drones and Rocketry clubs Community Colleges Developing Technical skills and resources Universities Supporting student teams and partnering in research Aerospace Comraderie Working […]
